basics.name: Matthieu Sola
basics.label: Data and Product Manager
basics.summary: Program Manager with extensive experience leading complex, cross-functional projects involving data, AI, and machine learning. Skilled in managing products and programs with multiple dependencies, coordinating diverse teams, and driving successful outcomes across large-scale initiatives. Proven track record in navigating technical challenges, aligning strategies with business goals, and fostering collaboration among technical, product, and executive stakeholders.
